caption.p:
Results of Bayescan F
ST
outlier analysis on 14 gSSR (a) and 13 EST-SSR loci (b). The vertical bars correspond to threshold P-values of 0.05 (solid line) and 0.01 (dashed line) for the neutral model. (a) Data from all 16 populations. (b) Data from 11 European populations.
Click here for additional data file.
